See magnificent natural attractions including, Inspiration Point, El Capitan, Half Dome, Yosemite Falls and Bridalveil Falls. Admire the park's most famous sightseeing points and learn about the history, geology and wildlife in the region. Take a short hike to Mirror Lake or Lower Yosemite Falls and be amazed by the natural beauty with plenty of photo opportunities along the way. 2 Day/1 Night Yosemite National Park Tour with 3 Nights in San Francisco - View Lodge (1 Night) Plus Handlery Union Square Hotel - Historic Room (3 nights) Travel Dates: 20 Dec - 31 Dec 25 Twin per person fr $1,680 Travel Dates: 11 Nov - 27 Nov 25 & 1 Dec - 19 Dec 25 Twin per person fr $1,504 Note: Yosemite and Giant Sequoias Overnight Tour excludes transfer from Yosemite Valley to View Lodge & back, meals & beverages & guide gratuity. Includes 2 nights pre and 1 night post tour at Handley Union Square Hotel Yosemite and Giant Sequoias Overnight Tour - 1 nights' accommodation at View Lodge - Hike to Giant Sequoias - Photograph Half-Dome, El Capitan and Yosemite Falls - Local expert guide - Pickup at most San Francisco hotels - Park entry fee included Per Person, from $1,504 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 31 Dec 2025. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Apr 2025 to 31 Mar 2026 (unless otherwise specified).Family pricing is based on per person cost for 2 adults and 2 children sharing one room and using existing bedding Land Only - Please add on your best available international airfares. Some prices are based on dynamic rates, which means they may be different from the advertised price if it has been varied by the supplier since being advertised by GO Holidays Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays.
